abstract: Apple’s reconfigured iMac desktop  a shiny wide-screen example of a home computer  works beautifully ...unless it doesn’t work at all, or arrives with a cracked display.
snippet: Apple’s reconfigured iMac desktop  a shiny wide-screen example of a home computer  works beautifully ...unless it doesn’t work at all, or arrives with a cracked display.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s reconfigured iMac desktop  a shiny wide-screen example of a home computer  works beautifully ...unless it doesn’t work at all, or arrives with a cracked display.

headline.main: Some New iMac Desktops Arrive With Issues
headline.print_headline: Some New iMac Desktops Arrive With Issues
